messages.messageBody:
Hi All!

Here is something for ALL of us to do! Not just the kids, but us too!

Have you ever wanted to play with Bubblewrap and make it pop? :) But gosh
darn it, there just isn't any in the house! :)

Well, now you can.....

Check this out! :) My mom sent it to me for my boys! BUT I am having just as
much fun with it too! :)

http://www.hrm.uh.edu/cwcole/bubblewrap/

If you just click on them one by one they will pop OR you can click the
Manic Mode button and then just go over the bubbles with your mouse and they
will pop as you cross over each one! AND when you click on the "fresh sheet
button, it says "Must have MORE!!!" for more bubblewrap! :) It is the
funnest thing! :)

The boys and I are having a BLAST with this! :)
Have fun everyone! Enjoy!

Patti and the boys (Chris 12, Matthew 7, Anthony 6)

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
